item.title: MarkDown
item.description: Some important markdown formulas. |Table Content|Value| |:---|:---| |Title 1|1| |Title 2|2| Table Content Value Title 1 1 Title 2 2 :– means the column is left aligned. –: means the column is right aligned. :-: means the column is center aligned. ${\sqrt{3x-1}+(1+x)^2}$ Equation is written in this form ${\sqrt{3x-1}+(1+x)^2}$ $\frac{(3+4)}{(2*{10^8})}$ $\frac{(3+4)}{(2*{10^8})}$ ${10^8}$ ${10^8}$ ${10^12}$ ${10^12}$ $10^{12}$ $10^{12}$ Making new posts in blog hugo new post/SystemDesign/HLD/Kafka/MessagingQueue.md Adding image in the file !
